## ClassDecoratorManager.registerDecorator() method

Register a decorator for a class

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerDecorator(target: Function, decorator: DecoratorMetadata): Function;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | Function | Target class constructor |
|  decorator | [DecoratorMetadata](./koatty_container.decoratormetadata.md) | Decorator metadata |

**Returns:**

Function

Enhanced class constructor
